name: part_000
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠】わためぇ Night Fever!! in TOKYO GARDEN THEATER【角巻わため⧸ホロライブ４期生】 [aBU9HgJmUWk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Pre-show information screens displaying attendance rules, merchandise lineup, and fan letters.
Tsunomaki Watame giving a pre-show announcement and safety precautions.
Continuation of fan messages and event logos with background music.
Joysound 'Miru Haco' commercial featuring fans watching a concert.

subtitles.original: Attention ご来場のお客様へ
subtitles.english: Attention: To all visitors

subtitles.original: 本日ば！
subtitles.english: Today!

subtitles.original: 角巻わため 2nd Live 「わためぇ Night Fever!! in TOKYO GARDEN THEATER」にご来場いただきまして、まことにありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for coming to Tsunomaki Watame 2nd Live "Watame Night Fever!! in TOKYO GARDEN THEATER"!

subtitles.original: 開演に先立ちまして、お客様にご注意ならびにご案内申し上げます。
subtitles.english: Prior to the start of the show, I would like to give you some precautions and information.

subtitles.original: 公演中の撮影・録音・録画機材の使用は固くお断り致します。
subtitles.english: The use of photography, audio recording, or video recording equipment during the performance is strictly prohibited.

subtitles.original: 会場内でのモッシュ・ダイブ・肩車、
subtitles.english: Mosh pits, stage diving, or sitting on someone's shoulders in the venue,

subtitles.original: ステージ上に物を投げ込む、
subtitles.english: throwing objects onto the stage,

subtitles.original: ステージ上に上がる、
subtitles.english: going up on the stage,

subtitles.original: 故意に通路を塞ぐ、
subtitles.english: intentionally blocking the aisles,

subtitles.original: 前に押し寄せる、
subtitles.english: pushing toward the front,

subtitles.original: 周りのお客様のご迷惑となるような不自然なコール・奇声、
subtitles.english: making unnatural calls or shouts that would disturb other guests,

subtitles.original: 公演の妨げとなるような大きな音を鳴らす等の行為、
subtitles.english: acts such as making loud noises that would interfere with the performance,

subtitles.original: 不自然なタイミングで両手を左右に激しく振る、
subtitles.english: violently waving both hands left and right at unnatural timing,

subtitles.original: 腕を振り回す・上半身をそらす…等の過激な応援行為、
subtitles.english: extreme cheering acts such as swinging your arms around or leaning your upper body back,

subtitles.original: 過度なジャンプ行為…等
subtitles.english: excessive jumping... and so on.

subtitles.original: 他のお客様のご迷惑になる、または公演を妨げる危険行為は一切禁止です。
subtitles.english: Any dangerous acts that would cause trouble to other guests or interfere with the performance are strictly prohibited.

subtitles.original: 本公演は、映像配信及び写真撮影用のカメラが会場内に入り、客席のお客様の様子が映り込む場合がございます。
subtitles.english: Cameras for video broadcasting and photography are inside the venue, and there may be instances where the audience in the seats is captured.

subtitles.original: これらの映像や写真はプロモーション等に使用される可能性がございますので、予めご了承下さい。
subtitles.english: Please be aware that these videos and photos may be used for promotional purposes, etc.

subtitles.original: 万が一体調に異変を感じる場合は、無理をせず係員へお申し出ください。
subtitles.english: In the unlikely event that you feel unwell, please do not push yourself and inform a staff member.

subtitles.original: それでは！まもなく開演いたします！
subtitles.english: Well then! The performance will begin shortly!

subtitles.original: お席に着いてお待ち下さい！
subtitles.english: Please wait at your seat!

subtitles.original: 以上、角巻わためでした！
subtitles.english: That was Tsunomaki Watame!

subtitles.original: 推しの曲、めっちゃいいー。
subtitles.english: The song of my fave is so good.

subtitles.original: みるハコ チャンス！
subtitles.english: Miru Haco Chance!

subtitles.original: みるハコなら、臨場感たっぷりで推しのコンテンツが楽しめる！
subtitles.english: With Miru Haco, you can enjoy your favorite content with a great sense of presence!

subtitles.original: みるハコ最高！
subtitles.english: Miru Haco is the best!
